name: Ruins of Agondray
description:
Title: Ruins of Agondray

Platform: PC

Genre: Adventure/Hunting

Rating/Target Marketing: E and Ages 6+, particularly casual gamers

Game Overview: Through the cave, you must guide your explorer robot after he is trapped from the outside by debris. Avoid the slimes and the mines they leave behind them and collect green relics to escape your way to freedom. At the end, there is a special relic - the hidden nexus and Agondray's lost artifact that will get you out of the cave. The relics permit progression and also grant you extra hits to take against the cave's guardians.

Instructions: WASD to move, shift to sprint. Collect relics to boost health, each point of health (integrity) protects against an enemy's attack, whether direct contact or touching a red mine. You do not lose relics if you get hit.

Press escape at any time to exit the game.
